Package com.example.lotteryevent.repository

Interface IOrganizerEventRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrganizerEventRepositoryImpl
public interface IOrganizerEventRepository
Interface for the fetching of event details and their entrants. It allows for event poster upload and finalizing an event

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    void
    fetchEntrants(String eventId)
    Fetches the full list of entrants for the specific event.
    void

    Fetches event details and capacity status from the database.
    void
    finalizeEvent(String eventId)
    Finalizes an event by updating its status in the database.

      Updates the poster image (Base64) for the specified event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to update.
      posterImageUrl - The Base64-encoded poster image data.
